application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: 1 x Pyracantha (applicants ref. T1) - Reduce height by approximately 1-2m bringing the new height of tree in line with the gutter. Prune and shape remaining canopy including pruning back from doorway, whilst retaining the main lateral branch over the doorway as a feature.1 x Japanese Maple (applicants ref. T2) - Remove any major deadwood over 40mm.Grouped section of trees including Bay and Laurel (applicants ref. G1a) - Reduce Bay in height by approximately 3m, trim, tidy and shape remaining canopy. Continuing the shape from the Pyracantha arch rounding off at the top of the bay. Reducing the Laurel to match shape whilst retaining as much lateral growth as possible to act as screening from neighbours window.2 x Conifers (applicants ref. G2) - Fell to ground level.1 x Spruce (applicants ref. T5) - Reduce height by approximately 3m and dome off top, prune back and shape south side of the canopy by approximately 1m setting the framework for future growth.2 x Privet (applicants ref. G3) - Reduce height to approximately 4-5m and shape, sensitively pruning laterals on the east-side of the canopy to retain as much screening as possible.Group of Bamboo (applicants ref. G4) - Reduce height to approximately 4-5m continuing on from G3.1 x Magnolia (applicants ref. T7) - Remove any crossing/rubbing branches, stubs, and any major deadwood over 40mm. Lightly thin canopy.
